question: 怎么把scipy.sparse.csr.csr_matrix转成numpy array
description:
怎么把稀疏矩阵scipy.sparse.csr.csr_matrix格式的变量转成正常numpy的array？

谢谢！

answers.lvl1_answer:
s.A可以得到一个numpy array

>>> import numpy as np
>>> import scipy.sparse

>>> my_matrix = scipy.sparse.csr_matrix((2,2))
>>> my_array = my_matrix.A
>>> type(my_array)
numpy.ndarray
